items.content_html: On top of all the other shit this week, Slack has decided to mess with my ADHD and hide about 50% of the carefully organized DMs and channels. I’m about ready to just toss Slack out into the arctic chill.
items.content_text: On top of all the other shit this week, Slack has decided to mess with my ADHD and hide about 50% of the carefully organized DMs and channels. I'm about ready to just toss Slack out into the arctic chill.

items.content_html: For the new year, I’m going to follow Dan Sinker’s guide on daily journaling. I struggle with task management at work, and with keeping track of what I’ve done throughout the year. I also have some chronic illnesses that would benefit from tracking.
items.content_text: For the new year, I’m going to follow [Dan Sinker’s guide on daily journaling](https://dansinker.com/posts/reflections). I struggle with task management at work, and with keeping track of what I’ve done throughout the year. I also have some chronic illnesses that would benefit from tracking.
